page.title: 05POLITICS IN THE REGION
page.content: Swinnerton School is located in the 'Ward' or 'Division' of Attleborough.Fourteen of these wards go together to make up the Parliamentary Seat of Nuneaton at Westminster.At County Council level Attleborough is known as a division and is entitled to one representative on the Warwickshire County Council, which is made up of sixty two divisions with each member serving four years.In the last election(May 1975) Mr.C.Bradley(Social Democratic Party) was elected as the member for Attleborough. The electorate of Attleborough are registered in November each year on what is known as the 'Electoral Roll'. At present there are 6,002 people on the roll(you have to be over 18 and resident in Attleborough to qualify).In the last County Council Election 54.6% voted.
